version_description:
* Logout bug fixed
* Redesign Deal detail
* Several other bug fixes

- Now, it's possible to select the last SIM card in the Viking App if you have many in your account.
- Your Viking Talk usage is now represented in Viking Points.
- Miscellaneous bugs fixed

* Miscellaneous bug fixes
* Solved TouchID issue
* 3D Touch
* It's possible to turn TouchID off now
* As of now, the Viking Talk App will open automatically if you use Viking Talk via the Viking App. Don't have it yet? Then you'll be redirected to the App Store, where you can download it.
Miscellaneous bug fixes
* Bugfix iOS 7

* Bug fixes and general improvements
* Please update to WatchOS 2 if you want to keep using your Apple Watch, as WatchOS 1 is unfortunately not supported any longer.
Misc fixes
Miscellaneous bug fixes
Fixed a potential crash. This one won't be shipwrecking anyone soon =)

Widget related changes: 
- Widget is now expandable on iOS 10
- Adjusted color scheme (due to being hard to read since iOS 10)

Widget: 
    - Our services were returning some faulty data if you have a subscription. We improved the widget's resilience so it doesn't get shipwrecked. Sail on!

Ever felt like being trapped ? .. While trying to share Viking Points? Well, we fixed that. Combined with you being redirected towards the Dashboard when pressing 'Done' after a topup. Full speed ahead!

With the season about to change we decided to try a different color on the app. Let us know how you feel about it!
We also: 
* squashed a bug during the on-boarding flow
* altered the widget a bit (more to come) 
* removed some stuff nobody was really using anymore
Happy sailing!

We're looking for a crash. Have you seen it? Are you able to show us how to find it? Tweet us please!
Also: There's something about this *version* .. Hidden from peering eyes. Though ye should seek, find thou shall!
If you're not able to reload and our mothership knows why, it'll now show in the app!
We are in the process of making our app better.. Despite our good intentions we released some bugs last time. This release should squash them!
We have some exciting news... You'll see it when you first open the app! #roaming

Harr harr! 
Postpaid users might have seen a weird amount of days remaining on the widget, we fixed that now.
Sail on!
Release notes? What release notes?
We have some exciting news... Open the app and see for yourself! #subscriptions

Your Apple Watch now displays the marvellous 'infinity' symbol if you're entitled to unlimited texts #subscriptions
We also fixed a rare crash on the credit history screen - No more sinking, happy sailing!
Our backend decided to change a return value, and we got bit. We patched the issue! Your remaining calling minutes are back in the widget #subscription

Ahoy! We have had a very busy period, and apologise for the wait! In this version we provide you with renewed APN Settings, squashed some bugs and ... got rid of these black bars on that shiny new iPhone X!

There. Done injecting the Viking App with some new stuff. Have a look!

• Invoices/payment invitations for your subscription(s) can now be viewed and paid in the app too.
• New payment methods! Yes sir, Bancontact, VISA and MasterCard are now available as well.
• Did have to delete the contacts screen due to GDPR. E.g. if we tell you which one of your friends are Vikings too, we might have the European Commission on our asses.
• Just for now, we bid farewell to the Widget and Watch features. Don’t worry though, they’ll be back soon enough.

• Just for now, we bid farewell to the Widget and Watch features. Don’t worry though, they’ll be back soon enough.
